name: Aviapayroll
description: Human-friendly interface for displaying payrolls from SAASU invoices.

SAASU_FILE_ID.description: SAASU file id (open any `purchase` in SAASU and copy `fchk` from URL)

DOMAIN.description: Domain name (e.g. `ya.ru`) to limit Google users from

GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI.description: Redirect URL for Google oAuth (your aviapayroll domain + /auth/oauth_callback)
